about_the_game:
Become the VR BOSS or Join the Epic Battle as a PC Player

Prepare for the ultimate showdown in Boss Fighters, where a VR player assumes control of a massive Boss monster and takes on a team of PC players in exhilarating funhouse battles.

This asymmetric action-packed experience offers unique gameplay like no other. Team up with friends as Fighters, working together to defeat the Boss or go head-to-head with your friends as the Boss. The choice is yours!

Choose Your Side

  • Step into the arena as a Boss or a Fighter and become a futuristic superstar gladiator, fighting for valuable loot, ranks, and the crowd's amusement.

VR Players

  • Utilize your VR headset to become the formidable Boss.
  • Unleash sheer power on puny fighters, tossing them around like toothpicks, demolishing buildings, and annihilating opponents with a variety of deadly weapons.
  • Experience unparalleled physics-based multiplayer action by facing off against a team of PC players.

PC Players

  • Form alliances with friends and fellow players as Fighters to take down the VR Boss.
  • Navigate the battle arena, seek objectives and supplies to recharge weapons and abilities, and strive to evade the Boss's clutches.
  • Collect rewards to upgrade your weapons and gadgets while customizing your appearance and playstyle.

What is an asymmetric multiplayer game?

Boss Fighters offers radically different gameplay based on the device. VR players can only become the Boss, while any player using a PC, keyboard, mouse, or controller can be a Fighter.

Do I need a VR headset to play BOSS FIGHTERS?

You can play as a Fighter without any VR device, but to take on the role of the Boss, a VR headset like HTC Vive, Valve Index, or Oculus Quest 2 + Oculus Link Cable is necessary.
